resources.string: Taylor A. Pettingill Project 6 This is a README for project 6. This project runs on a Pixel 5 Emulator. Press the Launch button to begin the application. There you can add flights and airlines, as well as search for flights. Enjoy!
Add a flight by filling in the form below and pressing the <Add Flight> button below

- Press <Save To Storage> if you would like to save to your local Android storage 

- Press <Search Airline> if you would like to search for a particular flight 

- Press <View Airline> if you would like to see all the flights you have added 



						Having trouble filling out the form? 

- Airline can contain any combonation of letters/numbers 

- Departure and Arrival codes can only be 3 digits long and only contain letters 

- Date/Time is in format MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM <AM or PM>
